sentence: Unilever PLC ( UL ) will begin trading ex-dividend on August 05, 2015.
A cash dividend payment of $0.3282 per share Shareholders who purchased UL prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an 2.88% increase over the prior quarter.
At the current stock price of $45.78, the dividend yield is 2.87%.
The previous trading day's last sale of UL was $45.78, representing a -0.43% decrease from the 52 week high of $45.98 and a 18.02% increase over the 52 week low of $38.79.
UL is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever NV ( UN ).
Zacks Investment Research reports UL's forecasted earnings growth in 2015 as 10.75%, compared to an industry average of 6.9%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the UL Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
